Description_lang: Deep Breath reduces the Essence costs of Disintegrate and Pyre by $411055s1 and increases their damage by $411055s2% for $411055d after you land.

description_blz.en_US: Deep Breath reduces the Essence costs of Disintegrate and Pyre by 1 and increases their damage by 10% for 12 sec after you land.
description_blz.es_MX: Aliento profundo reduce 1 p. el costo de esencia de Desintegrar y Pira, y aumenta un 10% su daño durante 12 s luego de aterrizar.
description_blz.pt_BR: Respiração Profunda reduz em 1 o custo de Essência de Desintegrar e Pira e aumenta em 10% o dano dessas habilidades por 12 s depois que você pousa.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Tiefer Atem' verringert die Essenzkosten von 'Desintegration' und 'Scheiterhaufen' um 1 und erhöht ihren Schaden nach Eurer Landung 12 Sek. lang um 10%.
description_blz.en_GB: Deep Breath reduces the Essence costs of Disintegrate and Pyre by 1 and increases their damage by 10% for 12 sec after you land.
description_blz.es_ES: Aliento profundo reduce 1 p. el coste de esencia de Desintegrar y Pira y aumenta un 10% su daño durante 12 s una vez que aterrizas.
description_blz.fr_FR: Souffle profond réduit les coûts en essence de Désintégration et Bûcher de 1 et augmente leurs dégâts de 10 % pendant 12 s après votre atterrissage.
description_blz.it_IT: Alito del Drago riduce il costo in essenza di Disintegrazione e Pira di 1 e ne aumenta i danni inflitti del 10% per 12 s dopo l'atterraggio.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Глубокий вдох" сокращает затраты сущности на "Дезинтеграцию" и "Погребальный костер" на 1 ед. и увеличивает наносимый ими урон на 10% на 12 сек. после приземления.
description_blz.ko_KR: 깊은 숨결 사용 시 착지한 후에 12초 동안 파열 및 기염의 정수 소모량이 1만큼 감소하고 공격력은 10%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在你施放深層吐息落地之後，會使崩解與龍焰的龍能消耗降低1點，傷害提高10%，持續12秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 深呼吸在你落地后的12秒内使裂解和葬火的精华消耗降低1点，并使其造成的伤害提高10%。
